body_html: @ayush2991 It' s my carelessness. The tf.pow() API description doesn't refer to the broadcasting feature, while other operations (eg. tf.multiply()) have mentioned it if they support broadcasting. And I mistakenly think that there is not broadcasting in tf.pow(). Thx a lot! :)
body_text: @ayush2991  It' s my carelessness. The tf.pow()  API description doesn't refer to the broadcasting feature, while other operations (eg. tf.multiply()) have mentioned it if they support broadcasting.  And I mistakenly think that there is not broadcasting in tf.pow(). Thx a lot! :)
body: @ayush2991  It' s my carelessness. The tf.pow()  API description doesn't refer to the broadcasting feature, while other operations (eg. tf.multiply()) have mentioned it if they support broadcasting.  And I mistakenly think that there is not broadcasting in tf.pow(). Thx a lot! :)
